snippet.title: AiliA - Official Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
AiliA is a tricky puzzle game where mirror reflections are made real. Manipulate mirrors and guide Ail through a stunning, reflected world to save her long-lost "twin sister" Lia, who was captured inside a mirror.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1677100/AiliA
Play the available Demo Version: https://haroldsama.itch.io/ailia-demo

Find AiliA on Social Media:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/AiliAGame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AiliATheGame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ailiathegame
Website: http://ailiathegame.com
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCy5_uM-dU19pvm5OJRaW8HQ
Dailymotion: https://dailymotion.com/AiliATheGame
Odysee: https://odysee.com/
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/AuroraTLMGame
Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/company/ailia-the-game
Pinterest: https://pinterest.com/AiliATheGame
Discord: https://discord.gg/C84XhBq7MG

Business inquiries: info@ailiathegame.com
#AiliA #AiliATheGame #IndieGame
